lines: Jesu morati oa ka, Ke fofela ho uena,
Ha lifefo li ntlela, Ke tleloa ke meroallo,
Mpate, ao! Moloki, Fefo se be se fete,
Ke kene polokehong, U be u nkamohele.
Ha ho ts’abelo se seng, Ke shebile ho uena,
Ao u se ke oa ntahla, Uena u mphahamise,
U ts’epo eohle ea ka, Thuso e tsoa ho uena,
U nkhurumetse hloho, Ka lipheo tsa hao.
Ke batla uena Kreste, Ho fetisa ntho tsohle,
U tsose le ba oeleng, U folise bakuli,
Ke tletse ts’ila, sebe; U tletse khalalelo
U tletse khalalelo, E patang libe tsa ka,
Ho tle noka e folisang, U mpoloke bohloeking,
U noka ea bophelo, Ha ke noe tokolohong,
U mele pelong ea ka, Ke tsohele bophelong
